page.title: 12HILTON AND FENSTANTON
page.content: {HILTON}is about 2 and 1/2 miles from FENSTANTON,just south of section 028067.It is not as big a village as FENSTANTON,but the two villages have many connections. The{Vicar}covers both villages and{children go from HILTON}to {Fenstanton Primary School.About 84 {children travel to school by Whippet {Coaches and have been doing this from {1959. } {HILTON}has a{MAZE}but not the sort you get lost in. It also has a very old{HALL}.It is a huge house. You can tell because some of the windows have been bricked up.It looks old as well. In the{middle of the maze}there is a stone which you follow by the path cut into the earth. It is a twisty path{so the devil can't follow {you.
